name: Urusei Yatsura: Rouge Magic
overview: An adaptation from the 110th episode of Urusei Yatsura (original 80’s version) in which Lum creates a special lipstick that pulls two people together by magnetic force, forcing them to kiss. She plans to use it on Ataru, but things doesn’t go as expected… In this game, you must collect the lipsticks from Ataru’s various love interests (green) by walking below them, while avoiding walking below your foes (red). Beware of Lum’s electric shots and of obstacles appearing out of nowhere! Published in the May 1985 issue of POPCOM Magazine.
